    • Uses of CouponSystemException in connectionPool

      Methods in connectionPool that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.closeAllConnections()
      This method closes all the open connections by removing them from the set collections
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      This method returns connection, and removes one connection from the connections set
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      This method Instantiates the connection pool singleton
